summary: Quick and simple retexture of the Vanilla Daedric Helmet and Shield.
descriptionHtml:
I\'m surprised this hasn\'t been done already. 
This adds red eyes to the Daedric Helmet, and a sort of glow effect to the runes on the shield. Just made it for personal use. Though some might like it.

I\'m sure someone will come along and do a much clearer version. But for now, here you go! :)


Install
Extract the zip and place into your Skyrim folder.
author: Kyim
